website_summaries.verdict: An affordable stocking stuffer that works for boys and girls, and is suitable for older kids too – even adults enjoy using them.
pros: Cool scratch notes that are a fun way for kids to explore their artistic and creative abilities
Black finish scratches off to reveal a rainbow of colors
Comes with a dispensing cube, wooden stylus, and includes 125 3.5-by-3.5-inch note sheets
cons: Not intended for very small kids, as the stylus has a pointed tip

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun to have around! They scratch off perfectly and not like others that you struggle with just to see any line of color. I'm looking forward to encourage the kids to write fun notes/pictures for each other, friends, and family. Perfect for birthday cards. I love them and am looking forward to add fun notes in the kids lunch box and backpack :) My only complain is that I wish it came with a couple more sticks. Four sticks would have been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear03

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right.
customer_reviews.text: Idea, construction, and display is all great. Execution is not the smoothest. The dark blue is so dark you can’t read what has been etched in. Not really usable.
customer_reviews.author: Metalshaper

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you like green non-rainbow note cards...
customer_reviews.text: The 'rainbow' note cards arrived with only green and a tiny edge area of yellow. ONE card did have the rainbow effect- which may have been the first/top card in the deck. omg. Regardless, the 7-year old enjoyed using the cards, but the topic of conversation throughout playtime was "Only green AGAIN!". $7+ is too expensive for non-rainbow note cards. PS Don't use these cards in a car-- too much black 'crumbs' to clean up. Suggest putting a paper towel under cards when using/scratching off the black coating, for easier clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Poor range of color
customer_reviews.text: The range of background color on these scratch art notes is lacking. All of the notes in my pack have the same background. Variety would have been nice! Especially since the main part of the page is mostly green and blue. I would not purchase these again. I will be contacting Melissa and Doug about this poor quality issue. I expect more from Melissa and Doug products.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Ronk

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but colors not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot of fun. They have entertained my 5 children and husband and I. BUT, the box we received was mainly blues, with yellows in the very corners only. I would have liked to have more colors as shown in the advertised picture. But, nonetheless these have provided a lot of fun and creativity. If the colors were as advertised, this would definitely be a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Maumauklan

customer_reviews.title: Scratch 1 color
customer_reviews.text: What it should tell you in the description is these are mostly blue. It includes a thin line of green and a thin line of yellow. 95% of color is blue. I've randomally scratched over 20 from throughout the pad with the same results. Yes, that means I've wasted 17 of them to make sure the colors were not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: These are the most fun things ever. I've gotten my niece and nephew a variety of the scratch art projects, but when I found these I knew I could stock up and let them create their own art and patterns. The trouble now is getting them to pace themselves through the pack! My sister is an artist and also took a stab, creating gorgeous, post-it sized artworks for the fridge. I will get these for anyone who has kids between 5-15 from now on.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed & too much trouble to return....
customer_reviews.text: The pack I receives is only a darker green, with a strip of yellow at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take to work with me, and we all love them! They're a lot of fun to use and give to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Ninness

customer_reviews.title: What is this!? Scratch art for ants?
customer_reviews.text: Let's call this what it really is, scratch art post-its minus the sticky side... Picture of this product makes it look way bigger than it is. Guess I should have done more reading into this since I was trying to be the nice gift giver and get a present that wasn't annoyingly loud or obnoxious for my 4 year old niece and now they will find tiny waxy scraps of paper all over the house. Oops!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Mc Dermott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $9 bucks but...
customer_reviews.text: I think I just overlooked the fact that they were "mini". I was expecting small to be like note pad size, not post-it size. If I wasn't on the losing end (20% restocking fee), I'd return it to be honest. Definitely not worth $9 bucks. The idea is great, we've purchased larger scratch art pads from Lakeshore Learning stores and they've been a hit, but I recall getting more bang for my buck. Do they work? Yes. Are they fun? Yes. Did my daughter still have fun with the mini notes? Yes, for all of 5 minutes as she scratched her way through all 125 tiny pages. You win some, you lose some.
customer_reviews.author: Samie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for adults!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little scratch art pad. Sometimes I just need a break and a little distraction to let my brain breathe so I pull this out and make all sorts of designs. You do get a little of a mess by scratching the black off but I usually have a big mess cause I end up scratching the whole thing off. Can't help it. Kid at heart I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jnae

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but all one color. All!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the larger sheets, but disappointed in the colors. The photos make me think the scratch papers are multicolored, but the first half of the box that my 5-year-old has gone through is mostly green. All the sheets he's used are 95% green, with a 1/4 inch of yellow on one edge and one lone tiny splotch of blue in the middle. I know they're all exactly alike as my kid "battles" with his sheets and eventually scratches off the entire surface.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Color Range at ALL
customer_reviews.text: The very first square had wonderful coloring underneath the wax surface. Every piece after that had very limited coloring when scratched off—so much so that a written note could not be read because of the SUPER dark blue. I thought it might be a bad box, so I opened the 2nd box I bought, but it was basically the same.
customer_reviews.author: CowMoo

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody loves this!! It is so fun to use and the colors are bright and beautiful! All the kids and adults in our house can't get enough of writing on this paper! The black doesn't rub off unless you want it to. I highly recommend this product. Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up so that the kids in my house have a different option of something to do. They can work on scratching and drawing which seems to be something they are interested in. The paper is thin but the coating of black on top to scrape off isnt to thick or to thin. There was a little worry of accidently scratching it when handing it to them but it held fine. the kids are able to easily scratch them with something dull like an unsharpened pencil. It does only come with one scratching stick.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: good for the kids
customer_reviews.text: we are always looking for inexpensive and non electronic toys for our kids (6,4,3). these are great. they can scratch til their hearts content and make interesting things out of them. the little black scratchings are annoying, but if you have an issue with that, you should not be buying products like this at all. it's not a product flaw really, would be like complaining about the shells of eggs. it just comes with the territory.
customer_reviews.author: DMV Mom

customer_reviews.title: Small post its and it's messy
customer_reviews.text: You're essentially scratching black gunk of rainbow colored paper here. It's a little messy and difficult to write on. It's like a lottery scratch off, if you don't hold the paper down, you cant write on it, it's too hard to scratch through the black gunk. I don't recommend this for office use. Maybe for use at home but have clean up supplies handy
customer_reviews.author: Desna Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Loved but then disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved these to start but now we have hit the middle and all we get is pages with only blue and green. We've literally scratched the whole page to just get blue and green colors many times. We are hopefully the bottom small amount is back to expected rainbow of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining...
customer_reviews.text: Fun and entertaining for both children and adults alike. Our children love these and have so much fun scratching different details over the rainbow background. They want the holographic scratch papers now too. The package came quickly and on time. The brand of Melissa & Doug we have used for years, some things have questionable quality, but most products are good, including this one, and the hours of imaginative play encouraged by their products never fails.
customer_reviews.author: SnowyCocaLlama

customer_reviews.title: Bringing back creativity of the mind
customer_reviews.text: Was a big hit. Not messy like most scratch art items. My 8 yr old grandaughter was thrilled and she spent hours at a time creating artwork. This is magical as its soo difficult these days to get kids minds off of automatically gravitating to electronic devices. I actually felt triumphant when she sat for atleast an hour engrossed in creating art ... without losing interest and begging for you tube streaming or cell phone games. It was such a good feeling!!😁🤗
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: less colors = less fun
customer_reviews.text: These were super disappointing. Ordered 3 different types for stocking stuffers for 3 kids. This was one of the 3 the pads. As other reviewers stated it will have sheets that are barely 2 colors in a blend which makes for super uninspiring art. One of the similar products  was the total opposite being composed of lots of different color circles creating great variety in the artwork, I would recommend that instead. The child who received this product was really bummed out compared to her siblings with the other products. On top of that the other products shipped almost immediately which was a factor for Christmas, this product just squeaked in arriving barely before. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Trazz

customer_reviews.title: Sweet gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8 years old and is resistant to arts and crafts activities. We bought this because it was a good price and a cute piece to add to his new bedroom. I was not sure if he was going to like it but I knew his older sisters would love it id he didn;t. Low and behold! He loves it and makes everyone pictures all the time. We have taped some of his pieces on his door and he is so proud of his artwork. I love how this product has inspired him. I highly recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christie Macias

customer_reviews.title: Works great but severely over priced
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved this christmas present. The pictures come out amazing, as you can see in my attached photo. Its very colorful and the drawings come out very uniquely, in rainbow colors and such. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because we recently found that the local Dollar Tree store sells these for just $1 instead of like $6 for these name brand ones. Pricing aside, these are great gifts for the little artists in your family!
customer_reviews.author: johnny0723

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when i stumbled upon these. I used to make them as a kid and they take forever to color and then paint over, and then dry. With these they are already done and ready to go. These are great for doodles, messages, or just about anything else you can think of. It would be nice if they included an extra stick to scratch off the ink with but any rigid will do. The kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: -T

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. They're fun to make notes, pictures, or just silly designs. Even just scraping off all the black stuff to see the color underneath looks cool. Highly recommended for kids, but even my wife and I enjoy them as well. They have full sheet sizes too.
customer_reviews.author: The Natural

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a stocking stuffer for Christmas! I remember using these when I was in school and they are just as awesome as I remember! It comes with a wooden stick to use and you can draw anything and it looks like a rainbow! My daughter loves them and I love them too, so they are good for most ages! Its definitely a fun little activity we do together and for $6.99 we got a ton of them! Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Only green colors.........
customer_reviews.text: Little girl dissapointed... no rainbow colors. Only.green colors..no rainbow colors...
customer_reviews.author: jhubbard

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: I put a dozen of these pads in ziplock bags and put a wood cuticle pusher in each bag for kids to play with at a party. They enjoyed it and took their time playing with it and they ones they didn't use they got to take home and play with them at home. I will also note that I was pleasantly surprised how well made they were and also that none of them had any scratches on them ahead of time. It was a really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Unique82

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scratch cards
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect when ordering, but the set surpasses all my expectations and has already given my daughter hours of fun. The set is not 125 sheets of paper, but it is actually 125 thin carton pages, so they feel sturdy enough to hang on a wall or make some real fun designs with. The black color scratches off easy and the included wooden pen is perfect. In the restaurant we also used the back of a plastic spoon for a thicket scratch mark. Will definitely get more of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product but room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product! My only complaint is that the purple background color is too dark. You can’t see the parts drawn in purple very well. Look at the photo I posted that says “Happy 2019”: the parts you can’t see are the dark purple. Fortunately not all the cards have purple (see “happy new year”), but it can be frustrating to start drawing something only to realize that part of it isn’t gonna be visible
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: These have been super fun to work on. My 3.5 year old kiddo loves to draw doodles and her letters on these. When I’ve had a free few minutes Ive found myself working on my own doodles and it’s honestly addicting. The way the color comes through the black makes everything you do so much more interesting and pretty! great easy gift and you get a lot of sheets for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Dulberg

customer_reviews.title: Great for early readers/writers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 yr old niece. She's still learning to read/write and I feel this has encouraged her to want to do both. She loves copying words down on the pages and drawing little pictures. Perfect gift! Tiny con: It can get a little messy if she uses several sheets in a row. When she writes, the black comes off as if you're scratching a lottery ticket. Not a big deal but thought some might like to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My young (active, rarely sit down) children used these for over an hour the day they arrived! I enjoyed seeing their creativity and even used it to practice their letters. They were smaller than expected (my fault for not reading the dimensions), but for the amount you get and the price they were worth it. Nice vibrant colors! Comes with one stick, but a toothpick or skewer work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for boredom
customer_reviews.text: This was excellent when brought out for my 5 year when she was bored. She enjoyed drawing and writing with it and brought it on car rides with her. The only improvement I would make is the wooden pencil/stylus. I've seen some where one side is flat while the other side is pointed; giving the user different options/patterns. The black layer that gets scratched off can be a bit messy as well.
customer_reviews.author: n@nd0

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, box ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool idea. We bought this for a graduation gift and wrote personal messages all through the stack for our friend going off to college. The only problem was the box the cards are in was broken and ripped. We had to tape all around it to make it sturdy and that doesn’t look the best to give as a gift. It was evident the box was not damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our 4 year old nieces bday and she really liked them as did the other older and younger kids! Would purchase again and recomend for any type of gift really. I almost wanted to keep them for writing notes on but then remembered i put all my notes in my phone

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages. Children 3+ will like these
customer_reviews.text: Bought both this the ones you follow the lines. Children under 12 will get frustrated fast with the line ones. HOWEVER, even 3 & up will have fun with these. Used items to trace around and the little ones loved making art projects. Displays these that my grandchildren made & they are so pretty😊 Good fast activity for any age. Fun to use as gift cards or notes in a lunch for school for a special occasion. Used a dowels and sharpened with a pencil sharpener for different size doodling tool. You will be happy with these. Small but fun. BUY bigger size for bigger fun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Foster

customer_reviews.title: Some colors too dark.
customer_reviews.text: These are clever cards and easy for my 4-year-old to use. She loves them, but they have a couple of problems. The red and yellow are bright and easy to see, but the blue and purple are almost invisible. The other problem is that she uses them up rapidly. An older child might carefully draw clever pictures, but this little one just scribbles all over and then gets a new card.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Colors pop
customer_reviews.text: Scratch art, what? I havent seen these since I was a child. My own child is loving them. She wants to color them all into a large picture and cover her walls with them, seems pretty unique to me. They are easily scratched and designed, the colors seem to pop and show up really well. Thank you for bring back a piece of my childhood so my own child could experience it.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore

customer_reviews.title: Could be more colorful....
customer_reviews.text: What a fun way to spice up a letter or a household note! A little messy, but these little cards are exactly what I've been looking for! My only complaint is that the colors don't change nearly as frequently as advertised. 1 was almost entirely purple with a little blue... it seems like 1/3 of them are that bland. Melissa & Doug, splice tighter rainbows please!
customer_reviews.author: celeste

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little one and adults
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the thought that I would hand them out to my students for a Valentine message in French (I'm a French teacher) but then decided to keep them for myself and my granddaughters. Easy to use, to carve images into them; very colorful backgrounds. Love them. They cost about 7 cents each.
customer_reviews.author: Artisana

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: These were so fun!! We used them to write cute little notes for a coworkers birthday. Scattered them all over his desk. Everyone was asking where I got them. The only reason for 4 stars is that you can't just use any stylus to write. The wooden one it comes with was the only thing That could write very clear. Don't try to use dull pencils, pen caps, paper clips, etc. only the wooden stylus...which sucked when I had a ton of people trying to write at the same time. BUT Will definitely use the entire box for future projects!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: best notes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since i started dating my current girlfriend she loves to leave me notes when i travel for work or something like that and i find them hidden its adorable. Well she loves these things and they make the notes a little more fun! Great gift Might lose the little stick but any stick will do. Very colorful
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is great you guys, I bought it for my son.. And now i am thinking of splitting the box in half and keeping some for myself.. You can definitely use this for anything creative you can come up with. It reminds me of scratch off tickets, but way funner (when you put the opportunity to win money aside.) The colors underneath are vibrant and random! I love it... Can't wait to see his reaction, I have a feeling he will really get a kick out of these cards.
customer_reviews.author: Cheila S

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than A Cocktail Napkin
customer_reviews.text: SMALL SMALL SMALL I purchased these for my kindergarten students to practice writing their sight words; however, they’re incredibly small. So, I just use them for letter practice. They can fit 4 letters.
customer_reviews.author: Shereeta B.

customer_reviews.title: Addictive! And kids love them too
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these. I bought them for my toddler but have ended up keeping them on the counter and I make lists and notes with then for myself all the time. She uses them too from time to time but they're totally for me now. It's so satisfying to write on and the size is perfect for quick notes. My niece is 6 and she loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Yoder

customer_reviews.title: A gift that makes youre heart happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my little niece who is 7 this is what she picked out when I told her she and my granddaughter could pick out something they really wanted it for under $10 on Amazon this is what she picked out she was very pleased and happy with it and the look on her face was all I needed to see so yes I think this product is well worth a gift and I hope that other people can enjoy what I just enjoyed just watching her play with it or just getting it and opening up unboxing it it was priceless
customer_reviews.author: michele quarton

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful item.
customer_reviews.text: I would REALLY like to give this item 5 stars but the purple is just to dark. I have mostly LED lighting and the dark color is to dark to read the lettering. I am not much of an artist, more of a craftsman. Still this is a very nice item that would make a great gift. I do not see how anyone could resist giving this a try our of curiosity.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Really Small!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed it was very small! I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie McCreight

customer_reviews.title: My kid was entertained with these for a bit
customer_reviews.text: It a moment but once my son figured out what they did, he was off and running. He loved using these to make little cards and faces. I do think he got a little bored eventually because he still has half a box left. He will come back around to it eventually as he is always jumping from one thing to another.
customer_reviews.author: daydreamer

customer_reviews.title: Going to use as a stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: So these are a lot smaller than I thought they would be. We haven't actually used them yet but I plan on using them as a stalking stuffer due to how small they are. I wish it came with an extra stylus.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these on lightning for stocking stuffers. My son loves them and “gifts” one to everyone that comes over. But the best, my niece, she’s 7 but had never seen them apparently. She took out the first one and was scratching like a lotto ticket saying “wonder what I’m gonna get” over and over! Hehe. They’re fun!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Super fun note kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as an add on to gift for my 6yr old. He loves them! Great way to encourage him to work on penmanship or just enjoy being creative! I’ve also wrote a few for lunch box notes. Can be a lil messy similar to a scratch off lottery ticket, with the shavings, but not an awful mess by any means;)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: Great as gift tags or little notes
customer_reviews.text: Great as gift tags or little notes. I use them as gift tags on gift bags. Punch a little hole on top, attach a ribbon, and decorate with the recipient's name...it's always been a hit I also used these in party favor bags. It only comes with one stick, but most kids know they can use any stick to write on it. I've used these to leave little notes for my kids. My daughters have used them to decorate for friends. It's just a nice fun paper pad. The only down side is that since it is a scratch art. There are black residue that end up everywhere. It's kind of like erasing something .
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper:)

customer_reviews.title: Children Approve
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are many of these note cards and their size. As a teacher, I give these to my students (4- 5 years old) to create different drawings and art. They love scratching off the top and are constantly asking if they can draw more (that's why the 125 count is awesome). Since it only comes with one wooden stylus, we use toothpicks to draw out their art. The size is just big enough where they can draw their pictures without complaining about having no more room. I would say it is the size of a coaster tile and the cards are thick like card stock. Will be buying more when I run out of the current stock.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: These are great to put in a preschool/early elementary stocking! I also think it would be great for an operation Christmas child box. They’re about the size of a post it and it comes with plenty for multiple opportunities for fun.
customer_reviews.author: heathermoon

customer_reviews.title: Fun Way to Write Notes or Doodle!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I loved the first pack of these that I bought so much, that I quickly ordered a set for each of us to have our own! They are so fun to write notes or doodle on. The black coating covers very cleanly and evenly. It's scrapes off easily, revealing a bright rainbow colored background behind. It's so fun to see how each thing we write or draw will look. Such a fun purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Krazy MamaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any age
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me and don’t know measurements on the top of your head then don’t be surprised when it comes and it’s not what you were expecting. Size is a little bigger than a sticky notepad. Besides size it is a pretty cool. The possibilities are endless what you come up with to see a cool design.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki808

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning activities
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these enough to practice writing his site words! After fighting over flash cards I stumbled across these and thought they were worth a shot. We use them for him to practice writing and making his own flash cards and because it feels like more of an art project he really likes doing it. Highly recommended! Also if you lose the little wooden stick these cards come with a wooden chopstick works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Berry

customer_reviews.title: Fun Colors
customer_reviews.text: What a fun art box. I’m trying to get my four year old interested in art and this did it. You never know what color is underneath until it’s scratched off. Besides the purple which is too deep and does not have much contrast all the other colors are beautiful and bright. Give it a try
customer_reviews.author: NAP

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 colors
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled into thinking this "rainbow" pad contains all the colors of the rainbow. As you can see from my pictures, each piece of paper only has 3 colors. If you don't mind, go ahead and purchase. If not, don't waste your money. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Trish M.

customer_reviews.title: Little post it size cards
customer_reviews.text: These are little post it size scratch cards. The paper is about card stock thick. Perfect for little hands. Not hard to scratch off at all and make little designs and images. Girls loved it. Great for students or parties or games.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for notes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for notes for my kids, we all love using them and the kids are getting to color one each night as a prize for finishing homework. My son even wrote his spelling words on one tonight to study for his text tomorrow. Great product, wish it came with an extra wood pen since the kids lost it on day 2.
customer_reviews.author: A Friedman

customer_reviews.title: How can you not have fun with these?!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun! A great size for toddlers to use while not being overwhelming. I used these at a party with 4 and 5 year olds. They loved it. My son, age 4, has drawn several cards in his own time; animals, trucks, cars, monsters. The rainbow scratch art really invites him to draw and the small size invites him fill the whole drawing space. I also had fun drawing with him. These also worked well as party favors, I just had to get a wooden drawing stick to send home with the kids. I recommend these for kids 4 and up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I’d like to see different, is someplace to store the wooden pencil scratcher thing. These are kids were talking about, things get lost so easily and the wooden pencil is small so someplace to put it away or even keep it attached to the pack with a string would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love Melissa and Doug in my house :) these scratch off pages are the best. I used them to draw some things for family Christmas cards. It’s perfect if you even wanna write notes. The wooden stencil is the perfect size and thickness. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: j e n n y

customer_reviews.title: Fun note cards
customer_reviews.text: We love these fun little cards! I keep a small bag of them with the stick in my bag to entertain my kids when we are out to eat or waiting at an appointment. They’re also fun to write little notes to your kids and stick them in their lunches or backpacks to find later :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: My younger girl thought this was a cool stocking stuffer. My older girl thought it was “meh” but she thinks that about most everything these days. Haha About the size of a post it note.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift, but I got to play with it a little. I do love it...it is a lot of fun. My only complaint is that the colors aren't as varied as shown in the picture. There's a lot of red/yellow/orange. Very little blue/purple, if any. But, it's still a fun doodle pad.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Different yet cool
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to the kids as a stocking stuffer. The kids thought that these were pretty cool. These are basically a multi colored card that is covered with a black scratch off material. Use your artistic talent to scratch off the material in some pattern and make a little pic.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogo

customer_reviews.title: Missing Stylus and horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 year old daughter as a stocking stuffer for Christmas. It didn't come with the wooden stylus to write on the pages and nothing around the house seems to do the job very well. Two calls to Melissa and Doug's customer service and an email and as of 3 weeks after Christmas we still don't have one. They promised to mail one out, then promised to rush one out. Still nothing. Horrible customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jason E

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a young artist
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 8 year-old niece. She loves anything artsy, and she flipped over this! It's great for doodles and practicing handwriting. The only downside is that if you lose the little wooden stylus, you'll have to be creative and figure out something else to use instead. It would be pretty easy to lose the stylus, because it doesn't really have a place to "go" in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Got these to have on hand on a long road trip and they worked out well. Great for little hands. This was a great alternative to the pricey books my kiddos just scrape a few lines on a page and go onto the next page.Could be a little cheaper, but worth it for the instances it has saved kids from a meltdown. As with any of these scratch off paper they leave little scratch dust that also makes their nails black, but nothing that can't be easily cleaned up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift, but could have come with more than one scratching tool.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son for Christmas. He loved them, and the amount of cards you get is great for the price, I just wish it came with more than one stick to scratch the cards with. I ended up going out and purchasing a set of wooden cuticle pushes and those work great with these and are very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Zumchak

customer_reviews.title: cute colorful notes
customer_reviews.text: These cute little notes are great for our little girl who loves to write. What's amazing is as she writes with the special pencil the cards have all kinds of colors that pop up as she writes her little "love notes" to all her friend and family. We like them.
customer_reviews.author: Dream CatcherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use for notes
customer_reviews.text: We have the pack of these on the kitchen table and they get used to doodle while eating breakfast or while making phone calls, or my daughter will doodle on them while we talk as I make dinner. Overall fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Traquy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for anyone artistic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neice who is roughly 10yrs old for Christmas. She unwrapped the gift wrap and then proceeded to open the box and sit down and start drawing. Which is saying a lot for her because she has such a short attention span. She came running over to me to show me what she drew and was super excited that it was all different colors. I have a feeling this won't last her long but I know she is enjoying it. It's the perfect size for small doodling which is what she does. These are great for anyone who is artistic that can use a small wooden stick to scratch the black away.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly RTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fun but will leave some residue
customer_reviews.text: Fun activity. It only comes with one wooden stick, so if you have multiple kids or if you loose the stick then you’ll have to find other methods to scratch the paper. Scratching the black paper film leaves some residue on The table and hands. This is Expected though.
customer_reviews.author: Buatkokk

customer_reviews.title: Fun for notes and drawings
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these - one for each of my teenage kids and one for me. They've been a huge hit! It's been fun seeing drawings and notes passed around the house in rainbow colors. The only boy great thing about them is that the whole box only comes with a single scratcher, so if you lose that one scratcher then you have to improvise...
customer_reviews.author: J. Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Another super fun Melissa and Doug product
customer_reviews.text: My Grandkids love these!! The only reason I gave them 4 stars is I thought they were larger. The kids don’t seem to care though. I must say I have never been disappointed in anything from this company. I really recommend anything they sell.
customer_reviews.author: King’s Dry Goods

customer_reviews.title: Four year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are really fun! I usually dole them out bit by bit so they don't go too fast, and there will be some scratch ticket-like bits on the table to clean up, but they're fun to draw on (for adults too ...) and make pretty pictures. It was a great gift for Christmas stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kid notes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I just wish they came with a 2nd pencil. (Actually the reason I bought a 2nd set.... I wasn't out of cards yet.... but our scratcher/pencil went missing.... tried to use a skewer..... didn't work). I use them for daily lunch notes for my girls! (Age 7 and age 5).
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great Kid Activity
customer_reviews.text: I've had this one package for roughly 6-9 months now and my kids are still using it! Great stuff. Fun for adults too. The black covering gets a little messy at times, but it's an easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Long-time browser, Short-time customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little notes
customer_reviews.text: These are really fun to write on and use for little notes. I keep them on my desk and use them instead of post its. Each sheet has a different color pattern, so you never know what you will get.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy to use. Great for kids and mildly therapeutic.
customer_reviews.text: We got these for a church event that kept us all entertained. Fun and easy to draw on, all of the kids could use them. Very entertaining. They left black dust on some things, but easily washed off or out, it wasn't a big deal at all. Highly recommend for younger children. All you have to do is scratch the square with a provided tool and VOILA instant mesmerizing rainbow colored drawings.
customer_reviews.author: T Janette Holdahl

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift idea...
customer_reviews.text: These were a huge hit with my 6 1/2 year old girl. Honestly, me an her mom love them too. A unique way to brighten up someone's day with a little note. I could see this being a very well received "office secret Santa" type of gift, or just an inexpensive birthday gift for that coworker, classmate, friend, or your child's teacher. We'll be purchasing again when these run but, but next time we'll get more than one pack for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ø™Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Art
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about toys and I do not rate often. This is awesome!!!!!!!!!! I highly recommend. As a matter of fact I am ordering more to keep as prizes for classmates. I used to make these when I was little using a black crayon over rainbow colors but this takes the cake. There are plenty. It is not flaky or messy. It's a simple toy but this would make a great writing incentive for children who are reluctant. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Fun For Kids AND Adults!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these scratch pads for my best friend’s 2 girls but ended up bringing one set to work also. My little nieces love writing notes on these AND so do my coworkers! They come out really pretty and it’s such a cool idea!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDogLadyx3Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A different and fun way to write notes
customer_reviews.text: A fun a different way to write notes to family members. My 6 year old son loves these. He’s learning to write so these are a fun away to leave notes or let him practice writing. I wish these came in 8.5x11 size notebooks!!
customer_reviews.author: HarleyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and could be a fun new spin on a post-it note
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought these in their stockings and they’ve already ended up being a way to work in letters and numbers without feeling like boring work. Then they also can turn into imaginative drawings with fun colors. Will buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bryce

customer_reviews.title: It’s what you expect from Melissa & Doug
customer_reviews.text: We constantly return to Melissa & Doug products for their quality. This product didn’t disappoint. There’s a nostalgic factor for us adults who remember elementary school art class projects using scratch paper, and our four-year-old loves creating her masterpieces. Hey, we even have a few cards found by the dog who scratched some of his own works of art!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Family

customer_reviews.title: My 10-year-old and 6-year-olds love this!
customer_reviews.text: What a great gift! I saw this and knew my girls would love it, and they do! My 10-year-old spent about 45 minutes drawing pictures on the papers as soon as I opened it. She likes to make different animal creations, sayings, and more. My 6-year-old also loves it - especially for playing tic tac toe! Great product. Doesn't leave a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jp17

customer_reviews.title: ... compact and reliable go-to for when the kids get bored. You get a lot of cards for a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a compact and reliable go-to for when the kids get bored. You get a lot of cards for a great price. I don't know how much plain paper I end up recycling with only a little bit of time spent on the activity -- drawing or painting. These seem to hold their attention longer, and I feel they're less wasteful as well. I bought wooden manicure sticks at the store so more kids could use the cards at one time.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a kid learning to write and draw.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super quickly, easy package to wrap up nicely for christmas. Was a great stocking stuffer for my 6 y/o. Thankfully comes w the tool to etch with, have seen options where you need to buy the ‘tool’ separately. Loads of papers allows for lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Ventura

customer_reviews.title: I love these sooo much
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking at getting these for a while because they looked so cool and I haven’t done anything like them since I was a kid. VERY happy I finally ordered them, they are very entertaining and look so cute! The colors were perfect on every one I’ve used to far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I didnt read the dimensions but the product was slightly smaller than I anticipated. But it works as advertised. I gifted them to kids and they loved it. Just had to give multiple because the size is a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and artsy
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly fun. I was skeptical at first but they actually make it feel like you can draw better for whatever reason. My four-year-old daughter loves them as do I. It does produce a little bit of black flaking, but it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wickelobe

customer_reviews.title: Very neat item.
customer_reviews.text: We couldn’t reuse the box after kid opened it so we put them in a ziploc. They were a hit on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mishel Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Bought for Christmas stockings, splitting the sheets so everyone could have some. We enjoyed writing notes to one another. I thought the sheets would make great lunchtime notes, or love notes to each other. They also are pretty, very colorful. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Scratch Art Box of Rainbow Mini Notes
product_meta.description:
Style:RainbowCreative kids can jot down notes, etch doodles, and make their own exciting drawings with our mini Scratch Art notes. This Scratch Art box includes 125 rainbow mini notes, a wooden stylus, and a handy “desktop dispenser” box to keep it all organized. It’s simple to use, delivers amazing results, surprises kids with every scratch, and gives loads of options for play! Kids 4 and up can jot down notes, etch doodles, create cool illustrations and designs, surprise people, label things, make lists, add to arts and crafts projects, and express themselves freely. The reusable desktop dispenser box contains 125 Rainbow Mini Notes and a wooden stylus for scratching designs or notes. As kids scratch away the surface coating, they’ll be tickled to reveal the bright colors hiding beneath. These notes are also great for classrooms, goody bags, holiday treats, gift baskets, reminders, travel activities, random acts of kindness, sweet notes for others, and much more! They’ll help grow creativity, fine motor skills, writing skills, a sense of discovery, imagination, and connection. Get inspired and add some color to someone’s day with an expressive and creative rainbow mini note! The Scratch Art Box of Rainbow Mini Notes makes an ideal gift for kids ages 4 years and up. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: Easy to use with amazing results: The Melissa & doug scratch art box of rainbow mini notes includes 125 easy to use rainbow mini notes which kids can use to jot down notes, etch doodles, and create cool illustrations and designs
Brightly colored notepad: Our scratch art notes feature bright colors that hide beneath the matte coating; Kids simply use the included wooden stylus to reveal them with a simple scratch

Multiple uses: Kids can create cool illustrations, surprise people, label items, create arts and crafts projects, and express themselves freely; This box of notes is great for classrooms, holiday treats, gift baskets, or random acts of kindness
Gift for ages 4 and up: The Scratch Art Box of Rainbow Mini Notes makes a great gift for kids ages 4 years and up

The gold standard in childhood play: for more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that nbc news called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100 percent happiness guarantee: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts; if your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right; our phone number is on every product

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars10,543 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
